name: Treasure Hunt - DATT 2300
description:
This is a small game made with Mosi: Môsi by sg (itch.io) for a university game design course - DATT 2300 (Samantha Fallahi).

The goal is to gather all 8 treasures! Careful, there are traps that can puzzle you if you're not careful.

Use the arrow keys to move.
